steps: ['boil eggs until hard boiled', 'place eggs in cold water and then shell', 'slice top and bottom from egg so it can stand up', 'shred lettuce finely and put on plate', 'peel cucumer , slice finely and place on top of lettuce', 'stand the eggs on bed of lettuce and cucumber', 'place 1 / 2 tomato on top of each egg', 'dot mayonnaise on tomato halves to look like toadstools']
